verses.roman:
sei naukā caḍi' prabhu āilā 'pānihāṭi'
nāvikere parāila nija-kṛpā-sāṭī

synonyms: sei naukā caḍi'-boarding the same boat; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—reached; pānihāṭi—the place named Pānihāṭi; nāvikere—the captain of the boat; parāila—He put on; nija-kṛpā-sāṭī—His own used cloth as special mercy.
translation: The Lord finally reached Pānihāṭi, and, as an act of mercy, He gave the captain of the boat one of His personal garments.
